content.body: I'm looking at WPT's update_html5lib_tests.py and I don't see a way to point it to a local (and modified) instance of https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-tests . What am I missing?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I'm looking at WPT's update_html5lib_tests.py and I don't see a way to point it to a local (and modified) instance of https://github.com/html5lib/html5lib-tests . What am I missing?
